abstract: Ford Motor says it will stop using certain airbag parts made by Takata in future vehicles.
lead_paragraph: Ford said it would stop using Takata airbag inflaters with ammonium nitrate as a propellant in any products under development.

headline.main: Future Ford Cars Won’t Use Takata Airbag Parts
headline.print_headline: Future Ford Cars Won’t Use Takata Airbag Parts

snippet: Ford said it would stop using Takata airbag inflaters with ammonium nitrate as a propellant in any products under development.
